```{julia}
using Pkg
Pkg.activate(".")
```

# Example from documentation.

```{julia}
    m = Topology(2, 6)
    addlinks!(m, 2, 0, [[1, 2, 5, 4], [2, 3, 6, 5]])

    for d0 ∈ 0:2, d1 ∈ 0:2
        links(m, d0, d1)
    end

    show(m, all=true)
```
